resources.string: Subscribe to channels to see their\nlatest videos here
This will remove all videos from your watch history. This action cannot be undone.
Videos you watch will appear here
Videos you like will appear here
Audio stream information not available yet.
This video is less than 2 minutes long. Would you like to switch to a specialized player?
Your downloaded %1$s will appear here.\nEnjoy your content even without internet.
Marked as watched — your recommendations will improve!
Got it! You\'ll see more content like this.
Videos you save to watch later will appear here
You\'re all caught up! New updates from your subscriptions will appear here.

This will completely wipe your 'Flow Brain' interest profile.

• All learned topics will be forgotten.
• Personality traits will reset to neutral.
• Recommendations will return to default.

This action cannot be undone.
Block topics you don\'t want to see
Restore from backup or import from other apps
Help support the development of Flow
Select the visual style of the seek bar
Swipe left/right edge to adjust brightness and volume in fullscreen
Choose your preferred source for song lyrics
Controls the size of album art and content cards
Show the horizontal shorts shelf in the subscription feed grid.
Show the horizontal shorts shelf on the home screen.
Show the Shorts tab in the bottom navigation bar.
Show a shelf of in-progress videos on the home screen.
Continue playing when app is in background
Replace clickbait titles and thumbnails with community alternatives
Show a button in the player to submit new segments
Tap to set or generate a user ID
Enter a custom user ID or leave blank to auto-generate one. Your ID is used to track segment submissions.
Failed to submit segment. Please try again.
Show manual PiP button in player controls
Select your preferred audio track language. If not available, the original language will be used.
Uses the video\'s native audio track
Choose how many seconds to seek when double-tapping the left or right side of the player.
Configure video buffering behavior to optimize for your network connection.
Balanced start time and buffering (15s min, 50s max)
Prioritize quick playback start (10s min, 30s max)
Minimize data usage with smaller buffers (12s min)
Manually adjust buffer sizes. Higher values prevent stalling but may delay playback start.
Topics you\'ve selected help Flow recommend better content. Tap topics below to add or remove them.
Videos with these topics won\'t appear in your recommendations. You can also use the \"Not Interested\" button on videos.
Track and control your screen time
Stats are based on your watch history across this app. Actual usage may vary.
A notification will be sent at start time.
Remind me to take a break
Get notified when it\'s time to sleep
Set reminders to balance your viewing habits
Save your searches for quick access
Choose how many searches to keep:
Restore your history, settings, and subscriptions from a Flow backup file.
Import subscriptions from a NewPipe export file (JSON).
Import additional data from YouTube Takeout
Import your watch history from YouTube Takeout (watch-history.html).
Import a playlist from YouTube Takeout CSV (Playlist-<name>.csv).
Import a music playlist from YouTube Music Takeout CSV. Appears under Music Playlists.
Imported %1$d entries from your YouTube watch history
No watch history entries found in this file. Make sure it is a YouTube Takeout watch-history.html file.
No videos found in this CSV. Make sure it is a YouTube Takeout playlist CSV file.
Download files in multiple chunks for max speed.
Using more threads can increase speed but may use more battery and heat up the device.
If you find Flow useful and would like to support its development, you can donate via the following addresses. Your support helps keep the project alive!
Create your first playlist to organize your favorite videos
Add videos from the video player\nto build your playlist
This will permanently delete \'%1$s\' and all its videos.
Tell us what you\'re interested in
Select at least 3 topics to personalize your experience
Full transparency on what drives your feed
How your interests shift by time of day
Implicit feedback from your viewing history

This will permanently erase:

• All learned preferences
• Long-term personality vector
• Time-context patterns
• Channel affinity scores

Your feed will return to a cold-start state.
Watch some videos to populate your interest nebula!
No playlists yet. Create one to get started!
Curated playlist of %1$s music from our community
Create your first playlist to organize your favorite tracks
Tap the heart icon on any track to add it to your favorites
Start listening to music to see your history here
Higher quality uses more data. Shorts use vertical video streams.
Insert at start of video queue
Add to end of video queue
No active video queue. Start playing a video first.
Tap to check for the latest version
Couldn\'t check for updates. Check your connection.
Back up your AI personality & learning data
Restore your AI personality profile from a backup file
